local_intent: Perceive the bread, compute a top grasp pose to goal_pose, open the gripper, approach and align to the bread within 0.01 m tolerance, and verify pose availability.
assumptions: Bread is within the workspace and detectable
Pose key goal_pose is used by downstream grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase consistent with GLOBAL_BT steps: DetectObject -> ComputeGraspPose(top, goal_pose) -> OpenGripper -> ApproachAndAlign(bread, 0.01, 2000) -> PoseAvailable(goal_pose).
